hero.description: The first Cognitive Operating System that gives back the doctor's time and patient sovereignty. No forms. No clicks. Just conversation.

features.headline: Talk. The rest is automatic.
features.description: MedScribe isn't dictation. It's a cognitive copilot that understands context, generates documentation, and learns from every interaction.

items.title: Audio to SOAP
items.description: From audio to instant SOAP Note. Structured, complete, reviewable.

items.title: Auto Documents
items.description: Automatic generation of prescriptions and certificates. Ready for digital signature.

items.title: Invisible by Design
items.description: You care, we write. Documentation happens without you noticing.

intelligence.headline: Beyond Transcription: Clinical Intelligence.
intelligence.description: We hear what wasn't said. ASL analyzes speech patterns, tone, and pauses to extract clinical insights invisible to the human eye.

markers.name: Response Latency
markers.description: Cognitive processing time indicating mental state

markers.name: Affective Marker
markers.description: Detection of emotional states through vocal patterns

markers.name: Semantic Disruption
markers.description: Identification of breaks in logical thought flow

markers.name: Prosodic Tone
markers.description: Analysis of intonation and rhythm for emotional context

intelligence.disclaimer: Auxiliary clinical markers. Do not replace professional diagnosis.

architecture.headline: Your data. Your control. Always.
architecture.description: Each patient is an isolated universe. No external entity accesses your data without your explicit permission.

features.title: Total Isolation
features.description: Each PatientActor lives in its own Durable Object. Mathematical isolation, not just logical.

features.title: Doctor as Guest
features.description: Professionals receive temporary permissions. The patient revokes whenever they want.

features.title: Zero Mass Leaks
features.description: There's no central database to hack. Each Actor is a fortress.

grid.title: Capsule Architecture
grid.description: Each capsule represents an isolated PatientActor. Hover to see the state.

ecosystem.headline: An Ecosystem. Not an App.
ecosystem.description: HealthOS orchestrates ServiceActors and EntityActors in a complete cognitive system. Each module talks to the others.

products.name: MedScribe
products.description: Voice clinical documentation. SOAP, prescriptions, certificates.

products.name: Regulation
products.description: Automation of regulatory flows and referrals.

cta.headline: Ready for medicine without bureaucracy?
cta.description: Join the professionals who are redefining healthcare.

footer.tagline: The first Cognitive Operating System for Healthcare
